category.name: Product Structure.CAD BOM Alignment
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PSM_Skip_Unload_PublishedPartAssembly_OnViewer
preference.preference_description: Controls if unload should be performed for published part structure from product graphic viewer or not. Valid Values: - true: When user un-checks a published part BOMLine, make part structure invisible on graphic viewer, but skip unload part structure behind the scene. This is the default value. - false: When user un-checks a published part BOMLine, make part structure invisible on graphic viewer and also unload part structure behind the scene.
